publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3670.2 Christine Grahame: Violence Against Women—As an amendment to motion (S2M-3670) in the name of Malcolm Chisholm, insert at end “, and further, in challenging the attitudes which place the blame on the woman and not the perpetrator, condemns the overt sexualised representation of young women prevailing in a range of publications, electronic or paper, driven by commercialism, which presents women as objects rather than individuals.”
